## GivetyStoreState type

Type of [GivetyStore](./lib-base.givetystore.md)<!-- -->'s [state](./lib-base.givetystore.state.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type GivetyStoreState<T = unknown> = GivetyStoreBaseState & GivetyStoreDerivedState & T;
```
<b>References:</b> [GivetyStoreBaseState](./lib-base.givetystorebasestate.md)<!-- -->, [GivetyStoreDerivedState](./lib-base.givetystorederivedstate.md)

## Remarks

It combines all properties of [GivetyStoreBaseState](./lib-base.givetystorebasestate.md) and [GivetyStoreDerivedState](./lib-base.givetystorederivedstate.md) with optional extra state added by the particular `GivetyStore` implementation.

The type parameter `T` may be used to type the extra state.
